Item.Value: [Text:You $Name$? I heard that you were starting a town out here and figured you could use a hand. My name's $Character_6$, a $Class_5$ looking for work. I'd appreciate it if you could set up a house for me. Maybe something that looks like this.[UnlockBuildingID:12]]
[Text:$Name$, hello. Having a good day I trust? Stay safe, and don't make me follow you around.]
[Text:$Name$? You look stressed. Please don't push yourself and make sure you're getting enough sleep. a few years back I tried six hours a night and let me tell you what a mistake that was.]
[Text:Oh, thank you. I really appreciate this.]
[Text:Is that really for me? $Name$! Thank you. This really means a lot to me.]
[Text:Hello, what can I do for you?.{Talk-Talk|Gift-GiveGift|%Friend-50%Join Party-Party|Never Mind-Cancel}]
[Text:Certainly, I'd like to see what we can accomplish together.]
[Text:Sorry,I'm very busy today. Maybe in a few days I can go with you again.]
[Text:You're running around in this rain? Ha, of course you are. There's no stopping you, is there? It's admirable, if concerning.]
